name: Meldow Method Survivor
description:
I'm a finalist at Instituto Superior Técnico, Portugal and I've implemented this experience in order to test my game model.

While playing you will be connected to my Web Service so I can log data that will be used for statistical validation of that model.

A paper will be published soon with the results.

Please play it and share it with everyone you like.

The game takes around 5 minutes to play. Feel free to make multiple runs.

Thanks in advance!

See you in the gaming world!!

NOTE

It might take over 20 seconds for the first load when pressing Next button

Also, there is no audio. Feel free to put some background music while playing
